attributes.action: Raise the personal allowance for Londoners to £15,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Londoners earning less than £15,000 Per Annum cannot afford to live acceptably in London and pay tax. Considering the amount of people earning much higher incomes and evading tax, low income people should not but put under such financial strain from all directions.

This is particularly the case for social entrepreneurs, entrepreneurs and freelancers who also have to make pension payments etc from their earning.
